params._projectId: The ID of the project to get direct payment addresses for.

returns._0: A list of direct payment addresses for the specified project ID.

params._projects: A Projects contract which mints ERC-721's that represent project ownership and transfers.

params._memo: The note to use for payments made through the new direct payment address.
params._projectId: The ID of the project to deploy a direct payment address for.
The ID of the project to set a new terminal for.

addressesOf(uint256).notice: A list of all direct payment addresses for the specified project ID.

beneficiaryOf(address).notice: For each address, the address that will be used as the beneficiary of direct payments made.

deployAddress(uint256,string).notice: Allows anyone to deploy a new direct payment address for a project.

projects().notice: The Projects contract which mints ERC-721's that represent project ownership and transfers.

setPayerPreferences(address,bool).notice: Allows any address to pre set the beneficiary of their payments to any direct payment address, and to pre set whether to prefer to unstake tickets into ERC20's when making a payment.

setTerminal(uint256,address).notice: Update the candybox terminal that payments to direct payment addresses will be forwarded for the specified project ID.

terminalOf(uint256).notice: For each project ID, the candybox terminal that the direct payment addresses are proxies for.

unstakedTicketsPreferenceOf(address).notice: For each address, the preference of whether ticket will be auto claimed as ERC20s when a payment is made.

userdoc.notice: Allows project owners to deploy proxy contracts that can pay them when receiving funds directly.
